thread.title: Sourcebits – a Globo Company – Named ‘HOT in 2015’ Winner in San Francisco
thread.title_full: Sourcebits – a Globo Company – Named ‘HOT in 2015’ Winner in San Francisco

author: prbuzz.com
title: Sourcebits – a Globo Company – Named ‘HOT in 2015’ Winner in San Francisco
text:
SAN FRANCISCO, CALIF. – October 22, 2015 – Sourcebits, a premier mobile app development company and division of Globo Plc (LSE-AIM: GBO, OTCQX: GOBPY), announced today it was named an Owler HOT in 2015 winner in San Francisco. Sourcebits was selected from more than 11,000 companies in San Francisco.
Owler, the world’s leading online source for free competitive intelligence with over 12 million company profiles in its database, awards the hottest companies in each city using data and analytics it collects from the Owler community.
“The Owler community is vital in helping us choose the hottest companies around the world,” said Brett Miller, Director of Marketing at Owler. “Every (anonymous) contribution adds to a company’s HOTness score and helps us determine winners in each industry.”
Sourcebits, funded by Sequoia Capital and IDG Ventures in 2011 for $10 Million, was acquired by Globo Plc in 2014. Headquartered in the San Francisco financial district, the innovative mobile app agency has delivered more than 30 chart-topping apps and completed more than 600 mobile projects. Sourcebits recently launched App Fuel , a new suite of design and development services.
To see the Sourcebits company profile on Owler, go to: https://www.owler.com/iaApp/107320/sourcebits-company-profile .
About Sourcebits
Since 2006, Sourcebits has been creating amazing apps for hundreds of the world’s most innovative brands. Based in San Francisco, the agency’s 200+ team members worldwide include industry experts in UI/UX design, mobile app development and web engineering, cloud computing, backend system integrations and mobile business strategy. Sourcebits has completed more than 600 projects for enterprises and mobile startups. More than 30 apps built by Sourcebits have reached the top 10 in their store category. Gartner named Sourcebits a 2014 "Cool Vendor.” Sourcebits is a division of Globo Plc (LSE-AIM: GBO, OTCQX: GOBPY). For more information, visit www.sourcebits.com.
About Owler
Owler is a free competitive intelligence tool that delivers customized insights on competitors, customers, and partners to over 100,000 business professionals. Owler was founded in 2011 by Jim Fowler, who previously founded Jigsaw (acquired by Salesforce in 2010).
